PERFECT! Just perfect. Perfect video and audio, no hardsubs (unless they are the original ones the editor of the movie put into), please seed and download this. Kiss_Kringle, Gopo, could you do PLEASE, Jee-won Kim movies in the same size of movie (around 2 Gb), PLEASE!! A Tale of Two Sisters, The Good The Bad the Weird, A Bittersweet Life... Please!!

I can tell you right now that these videos are not compatible for streaming on the Xbox 360. But there is a program you can get called Handbreak. The down side to it is you will have to Re-encode the video. But Handbreak also supports the ability to hardcode subs in the video if you wish. the only thing I can see so far that makes these Incompatible for the 360 is the Audio tracks. This should be your outcome if you wish to Re-encode, or for the Uploader, if you wish to upload a separate version for consoles.

H.264 support

The Xbox 360 console supports the following for H.264:

    * File extensions: .mp4, .m4v, mp4v, .mov, .avi
    * Containers: MPEG-4, QuickTime
    * Video profiles: Baseline, main and high (up to level 4.1)
    * Video bit rate: 10 Mbps with resolutions of 1920 Ăâ 1080 at 30 fps.
    * Audio profiles: AAC, 2-channel, Low Complexity
    * Audio max bit rate: No restrictions.
